description: Long term extension of CO2 emissions driven SSP5-8.5 with SSP1-2.6 land use forcing (part of the CDR-afforestation experiment). All anthropogenic, solar, and volcanic forcing. Anthropogenic forcing includes aerosol emissions, non-CO2 greenhouse gas emissions, and land use changes.  CO2 concentration calculated (i.e. emission driven).
long_name: extension of the LUMIP emissions-driven simulation following SSP5-8.5 with SSP1-2.6 land use
rationale: Evaluate the long-term Earth system response to reforestation during a high CO2 emission climate change scenario.

requirements.description: Run from 2100 for a maximum of 5000 years.
requirements.label: 2100-7099 5000yrs max

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model with biogeochemistry
requirements.keywords: AOGCM, BioGeoChemistry, AOGCM-BGC, Atmosphere-Ocean General Circulation Model
requirements.label: AOGCM-BGC Configuration
